GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

articles.author: icellusedkars
articles.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch

GET /api/articles (topic query).description: serves an array of all articles related to the query

articles.author: rogersop
articles.title: UNCOVERED: catspiracy to bring down democracy

GET /api/articles (sorting queries).description: serves an array of all articles related to the query sorted by or ordered in ascending or descending order

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves up an object of the article found by the id with all it's keys

exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge
exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves up an array with all it's comments by article id

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves up an object with all it's keys

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves up an object of the comment added of with all it's keys

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes the comment by id and returns no body
